carrier.name: Medical
carrier.about: Bachelor of Technology is a popular course for PCM students. You have the choice of becoming an engineer in different fields such as computer software engineer, electronics and communication, automobile engineer, aerospace engineer, mechanical engineering, civil engineering, and more. It is one of the most popular courses across India.

latest.scope: A degree in engineering can open up multiple career avenues for students. Other than ordinary courses, for example, mechanical, computers, chemical, and civil engineering, fresher fields are coming up that may expand openings for students seeking engineering. These incorporate applied mechanics, biotechnology, nanotechnology, instrumentation, metallurgical designing, marine engineering, and material science. The magnificence of engineering is that it couldn't just open up roads in different areas, however, the compensation could likewise be acceptable. You can decide to do a graduate degree in your picked field, through which you may acquire the level of Master of Technology (M.Tech.).
